directions.d: Cut string cheese in half crosswise.
Line baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place eggs in bowl and whisk.
Place bread crumbs into large shallow bowl.
Dip cheese stick halves into egg and roll in bread crumbs to completely coat sticks.
Place breaded cheese sticks onto prepared baking sheet.
Allow cheese sticks to stand at room temperature for about 5 minutes to set.
Repeat dipping in egg and bread crumbs to form a thick coating.
Freeze breaded cheese sticks for at least 2 hours.
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F.
Deep fry cheese sticks until coating is golden brown and crisp and cheese is soft, 5 to 8 minutes.
Let sticks drain on paper towels; cool slightly and serve warm.
